data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: Encouraging children to read has been a challenge as long as there have been kids and books. Reading is essential not only in education but in the modern world where so much communication takes place over email and text-based messaging systems. Because of this, parents should depend on the child’s language skill level, give him a story to read, or have a story read to them. When the story is finished, ask your child to pinpoint their favorite parts of the story. This can enable children to have fun picking out words and develop an interest to move to the next page. The more children are exposed to literature, the more reading will become part of their daily life. And parents should introduce new information or concepts to children. (129 words)
data.referenceText: How can parents encourage their young children to become good readers?
data.referenceTranslate: 父母怎样才能鼓励他们的孩子成为好的阅读者呢?
